{{- $src := .src | replaceRE `.poster\=.+|\#mute` "" -}} {{- $alt := .alt -}} {{- if not $alt -}} {{- $alt = .src | replaceRE `^http.+/(.*)$` "$1" | replaceRE `^(.+)\..*$` "$1" | humanize -}} {{- end -}} {{- $notlazy_mute := and .notlazy .mute -}} {{- $poster := "" -}} {{- if in .src "poster=" -}} {{- $poster = .src | replaceRE `^.+?poster\=(.+?)($|#.*$)` "$1" -}} {{- if not (hasPrefix $poster "http") -}} {{- $media := print "/media/" $poster -}} {{- with resources.Get $media -}} {{- if hugo.IsProduction -}} {{- .Publish -}} {{- $poster = partial "functions/image-format" (dict "image" . "size" .Width) -}} {{- else -}} {{- $poster = .RelPermalink -}} {{- end -}} {{- end -}} {{- end -}} {{- else if $notlazy_mute -}} {{- $poster = print "data:image/svg+xml;base64," ("" | base64Encode) -}} {{- end -}} {{- $preload := "" -}} {{- if and (not $notlazy_mute) $poster -}} {{- $preload = "none" -}} {{- end -}} {{- $attrs := dict "class" .class "controls" (not .bg) "muted" $notlazy_mute "loop" $notlazy_mute "autoplay" $notlazy_mute "playsinline" $notlazy_mute "preload" $preload "data-mute" (cond $notlazy_mute "" .mute) "poster" $poster -}} {{- $attrs = partial "functions/attrs" $attrs -}} {{- /* HTML */}} {{- /* schema */}} {{ partial "schema/video" (dict "name" $alt "thumbnailUrl" $poster "uploadDate" .upload "duration" .duration "contentUrl" $src "embedUrl" nil ) -}}
